description.en: Expands item carrying limit by 24 items for characters. You can only use 2 at the same time. Lasts 15 days.
description.ar: Expands item carrying limit by 24 items for characters. You can only use 2 at the same time. Lasts 15 days.
description.br: Expande o limite de itens que o personagem pode carregar em 24. Você só pode usar 2 ao mesmo tempo. Duração de 15 dias.
description.cns: 扩展24格物品栏，可以同时使用2个，持续15天。
description.de: Erhöht die Anzahl der Gegenstände die du tragen kannst um 24. Du kannst nur 2 zur gleichen Zeit benutzen. Hält 15 Tage.
description.fi: Expands item carrying limit by 24 items for characters. You can only use 2 at the same time. Lasts 15 days.
description.fil: Expands item carrying limit by 24 items for characters. You can only use 2 at the same time. Lasts 15 days.
description.fr: Débloque 24 emplacements d'inventaire pendant 15 jours. Vous pouvez utiliser 2 sacs supplémentaires en même temps.
description.id: Memperluas batas pembawa item sebesar 24 item untuk karakter. Anda hanya dapat menggunakan 2 secara bersamaan. Berlangsung selama 15 hari.
description.it: Expands item carrying limit by 24 items for characters. You can only use 2 at the same time. Lasts 15 days.
description.jp: キャラクターのインベントリアイテム所持数の上限を24個拡張します。同時に使用できるのは2個までです。(ログアウト状態でもカウントされ、15日間持続します）
description.kr: 캐릭터에 대한 아이템 휴대 제한을 24개까지 확장합니다. 한 번에 2개만 사용할 수 있습니다. 15일간 지속됩니다.
description.nl: Expands item carrying limit by 24 items for characters. You can only use 2 at the same time. Lasts 15 days.
description.pl: Expands item carrying limit by 24 items for characters. You can only use 2 at the same time. Lasts 15 days.
description.ru: Expands item carrying limit by 24 items for characters. You can only use 2 at the same time. Lasts 15 days.
description.sp: Aumenta el espacio disponible en 24 objetos de tu Mochila. Solo puedes usar 2 a la vez. Dura 15 días. (Presiona B para abrir tu Mochila.)
description.sw: Expands item carrying limit by 24 items for characters. You can only use 2 at the same time. Lasts 15 days.
description.th: ขยายขีดจำกัดการบรรทุกไอเท็ม 24 รายการสำหรับตัวละคร คุณสามารถใช้ได้เพียง 2 อันในเวลาเดียวกัน เวลา 15 วัน
description.tw: 角色可以多攜帶24格物品，最多可以同時使用兩個，持續15天
description.vi: Mở rộng giới hạn mang vật phẩm lên 24 vật phẩm cho các nhân vật. Bạn chỉ có thể sử dụng 2 cùng một lúc. Kéo dài 15 ngày.
